entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
